TopicTitle: Ask the Mods questions about the Forums!

I was ~~performing arcane necromancy rituals~~ posting in an old thread of mine when I noticed that that my post was tagged with "author" beside the "three-dot-menu." I never noticed that before. When did that become a thing? Or did it become a thing when the "three-dot-menu." became a thing and I never noticed that particular thing?
I started seeing that a couple of weeks ago. The software is updated from time to time.

Hey, [@Harald Kerbal](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/210553-harald-kerbal/)! Welcome aboard!

So I'm not sure how much you know about orbital mechanics, but the first thing you need to know about orbits is that you're not going up: You're going **sideways**.

I noticed that you posted a thread about this in the Gameplay Questions & Tutorials subforum. I suggest checking the answers there, because some of the posters have given you pretty good advice. (Also, this isn't really a thread about KSP so much as it's about the KSP Forum and assorted subforums.)

[https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/200960-getting-to-orbit/](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/200960-getting-to-orbit/&sortby=date)

Hope this helps!
